docstring.short_description: Iterate through the LOOP body blocks a given number of times (or -1 times for infinite looping).

parameters.name: num_loops
parameters.description: number of times to iterate through body nodes, default is "-1" meaning infinity.

returns.name: body
returns.description: Forwards the input DataContainer to the body.

returns.name: end
returns.description: Forwards the input DataContainer to the end.
